page.title: 02REASONS FOR VISITING PENNARD
page.content: TOURISTS COME TO THIS AREA BECAUSE IT IS ON THE COAST, AND THERE ARE PLENTY OF BEACHES WHICH ARE CLEAN. THERE IS PLENTY TO OFFER IN SPORTING ACTIVITIES AND DIFFERENT WALKS.e.g: GOLF COURSES, SQUASH COURTS, FOOTBALL AND CRICKET PITCHES, TENNIS COURTS, WATER SKI-ING,WINDSURFING AND WOODLAND WALKS. ALSO THERE ARE DIFFERENT SHOPS AROUND THE AREA SELLING DIFFERENT PRODUCTS. THE TOURISTS ALSO COME TO THIS AREA BECAUSE OF THE WEATHER IN THE SUMMER AND THE BEAUTIFUL SURROUNDINGS.THEY ALSO COME TO LOOK AT THE NATURAL WILDLIFE.IN THE SUMMER ON MOST FARMS YOU CAN PICK YOUR OWN VEGETABLES AND FRUITS.
